channel.title: Someones taking over our server help!
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/1392/screenshot7fj8.png[/img][/URL]
Me and a few mates have a server and we let a couple of people on and someones hacking it. PLEASE HELP HE BANNED US ALL!
THANKS, DUCKZ3

item.title: Someones taking over our server help!
item.dc:creator: @urballsrmine urballsrmine
item.description:
@urballsrmine wrote:

ok heres wat you do, do you have any admins on besides your friend? if so just take them away for a while to see if they were the hackers and you have to unban yourself by going to bannedusers in your files and just delete your name

Read full topic
item.source: Someones taking over our server help!

item.title: Someones taking over our server help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You should go into the source, delete all character files, and empty out the ban files. You should then leave the server off for about a week until this “hacker” loses interest in the server and moves on to another.

Good luck getting rid of this guy,
Inching Away.

Read full topic
item.source: Someones taking over our server help!

item.title: Someones taking over our server help!
item.dc:creator: @cody123 cody123
item.description:
@cody123 wrote:

If you can find the name of the person go to data file/banned/and put there name in there. Or just go to banned folder and and erase your name and save the banned folder and get on. Then ban who ever is on doing it?

-Hope that help.

Read full topic
